caption:
The photograph depicts two men standing at a table, closely engaged in examining or discussing a large map or a plan laid out in front of them. The older man, on the left, is bending slightly towards the map, directing his gaze towards it, suggesting a moment of explanation or guidance. He wears a white shirt paired with a striped tie and khaki-colored pants. His expression suggests concentration or focus. 

The younger man, on the right, also appears to be attentively engaged, pointing towards a particular area on the map. He is dressed in a white shirt with a dark tie, and his hairstyle reflects a younger, possibly 1970s or 1980s style.

The scene takes place in an indoor setting, possibly an office or workshop environment. The background is simple, with a cream ceiling and a golden-yellow wall, contributing to a subdued and professional ambiance. The lighting suggests an indoor setting with artificial light.

Overall, the image captures a professional interaction focused on planning or strategy, common in settings such as engineering, architecture, or urban planning offices. The focus and demeanor of the individuals suggest a moment of critical examination or decision-making.
title: The Los Angeles reactive pollutant program (larpp), is a unique, multi-agency air pollution research study sponsored by the coordinating research council, a government-industry research group.  At the operations center in el monte, the entire project is plotted, mapped, and recorded by personnel from epa and metronics corporation
